targets.rawSql:
select
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.%Y %k:%i') as value
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY time_sec DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  sum(T1.value_ue) as "Ãœberschuss",
  sum(T1.value_ge) as "Gewinn",
  sum(T1.value_ge-value_ge_no_bat) as "BatVorteil"
From
(SELECT
    (sum(Gewinne_Verlust.Verkauf-Gewinne_Verlust.BezugKosten-Gewinne_Verlust.MWST-Gewinne_Verlust.Abschreibung)+  IF(sum(Gewinne_Verlust.SteuerlGewinn)>sum(Gewinne_Verlust.Abschreibung+Gewinne_Verlust.MWST),sum(Gewinne_Verlust.Abschreibung+Gewinne_Verlust.MWST-Gewinne_Verlust.SteuerlGewinn)*$Steuersatz,0)) as value_ue,
  (sum(Gewinne_Verlust.Verkauf+Gewinne_Verlust.Ersparnis-Gewinne_Verlust.MWST-Gewinne_Verlust.Abschreibung)+  IF(sum(Gewinne_Verlust.SteuerlGewinn)>sum(Gewinne_Verlust.Abschreibung+Gewinne_Verlust.MWST),sum(Gewinne_Verlust.Abschreibung+Gewinne_Verlust.MWST-Gewinne_Verlust.SteuerlGewinn)*$Steuersatz,0)) as value_ge,
  (sum(Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.Verkauf+Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.Ersparnis-Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.MWST-Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.Abschreibung)+  IF(sum(Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.SteuerlGewinn)>sum(Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.Abschreibung+Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.MWST),sum(Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.Abschreibung+Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.MWST-Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.SteuerlGewinn)*$Steuersatz,0)) as value_ge_no_bat
FROM Gewinne_Verlust
Join Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly on Gewinne_Verlust.time_sec=Gewinne_Verlust_PVonly.time_sec
GROUP BY year(Gewinne_Verlust.TIMESTAMP) ) T1

SELECT
  1-sum(ac_kWh)/sum(PV_kWh+BatEntladen_kWh) as "WR Verlust",
  1-sum(BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) as "Bat Verlust DC",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh-BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(PV_kWh) as "Bat Verlustanteil"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily

SELECT
  "Aktuell" as "type",
  dcPowerPV AS "PV",
  BatPowerLaden AS "Bat Laden",
  if (BatPowerladen>0 AND EinspeisenPower>floor($maxEinspeisen*0.99),BatPowerladen,if(EinspeisenPower+BatPowerladen>floor($maxEinspeisen*0.99),EinspeisenPower+BatPowerladen-floor($maxEinspeisen*0.99),0)) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  BatPowerEntladen AS "Bat",
  acPower AS "WR",
  EinspeisenPower AS "Einspeisen",
  BatStateOfCharge AS "Bat Status",
  AktHomeConsumption AS "Hausverbrauch",
  AktHomeConsumptionSolar AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  AktHomeConsumptionBat AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  AktHomeConsumptionGrid AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time_sec AS time_sec,
  dcPowerPV as value
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY time_sec DESC Limit 1

SELECT
  time_sec,
  BatPowerEntLaden-BatPowerLaden AS value
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY time_sec DESC Limit 1

SELECT
  time_sec,
  EinspeisenPower AS value
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY time_sec DESC Limit 1

SELECT
  operatingStatus as value
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY time_sec DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time_sec,
  AktHomeConsumption AS value
FROM WR_Daten
where month(timestamp) = month($__timeTo())
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
  time_sec,
  AktHomeConsumptionSolar AS value
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY time_sec Desc Limit 1

SELECT
  time_sec,
  AktHomeConsumptionBat AS value
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY time_sec DESC Limit 1

SELECT
  time_sec,
  AktHomeConsumptionGrid AS value
FROM WR_Daten
where month(timestamp) = month($__timeTo())
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.%Y') as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  "AVG (per hour)" as "type",
  avg(dcPowerPV)/1000 AS "PV",
  avg(BatPowerLaden)/1000 AS "Bat Laden",
  avg(BatLaden_Frei)/1000 AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  avg(BatPowerEntladen)/1000 AS "Bat",
  avg(acPower)/1000 AS "WR",
  avg(EinspeisenPower)/1000 AS "Einspeisen",
  avg(AktHomeConsumption)/1000 AS "Hausverbrauch",
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionSolar)/1000 AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionBat)/1000 AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionGrid)/60000 AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (timerange)" as "type",
  sum(dcPowerPV)/60000 AS "PV",
  sum(BatPowerLaden)/60000 AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_Frei)/60000 AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatPowerEntladen)/60000 AS "Bat",
  sum(acPower)/60000 AS "WR",
  sum(EinspeisenPower)/60000 AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(AktHomeConsumption)/60000 AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionSolar)/60000 AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionBat)/60000 AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionGrid)/60000 AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (overall)" as "type",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily

SELECT
  time_sec,
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionSolar) AS "PV",
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionBat) AS "Batterie",
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionGrid) AS "Netz",
  avg(AktHomeConsumption) AS "Gesamt",
  1-LEAST((sum(AktHomeConsumptionGrid))/sum(AktHomeConsumption),1) AS "Autarkie"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV ($grouping*60)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionSolar/60) over (order by id) AS "PV",
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionBat/60) over (order by id) AS "Batterie",
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionGrid/60) over (order by id) AS "Netz",
  sum(AktHomeConsumption/60) over (order by id) AS "Gsamt"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  avg(dcPowerPV) AS "PV Power",
  avg(BatPowerEntLaden) AS "Bat Power",
  -avg(BatPowerLaden) AS "Bat Laden",
  avg(acPower) AS "WR",
  avg(EinspeisenPower) AS "Einspeisen",
  LEAST(sum(AktHomeConsumptionSolar+AktHomeConsumptionBat)/sum(acPower),1) AS "Eigenverbrauchsanteil"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV ($grouping*60)

SELECT
  time_sec-1800 AS "time",
  DCsim as value,
  "Prognose" as metric
FROM DWD_SIM_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec-1800)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(dcPowerPV/60) over (order by id) AS "PV Power",
  sum(BatPowerEntLaden/60) over (order by id) AS "Bat Power",
  sum(acPower/60) over (order by id) AS "WR",
  sum(BatPowerLaden/60) over (order by id) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(EinspeisenPower/60) over (order by id) AS "Einspeisen"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec-1800 AS "time",
  sum(DCsim) over (order by time_sec) as Prognose
FROM DWD_SIM_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec-1800)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  operatingStatus
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.%Y %k:%i') as "Zeit",
operatingStatus as StatusCode,
( Case operatingStatus
  When 0 then 'off'
  When 1 then 'anfahren'
  When 2 then 'Leerlauf'  
  When 3 then 'Einspeisen (MPP)'
  When 4 then 'abgeregelt'
  When 5 then 'Einspeisen'
  Else 'undefined'
  End) as Status
FROM (
    SELECT
        operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP,
        @rn := CASE WHEN (@prev <> operatingStatus) THEN @rn+1 ELSE @rn END AS rn,
    	@prev := operatingStatus
    FROM (
        SELECT operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP
        FROM WR_Daten
        WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
        ORDER BY ID ) AS a , 
        (SELECT @prev := -1, @rn := 0) AS vars 
) T1 Group BY rn ORDER BY `T1`.`time_sec` DESC

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  avg(dc1Voltage) as "String 1 Spannung",
  avg(dc2Voltage) as "String 2 Spannung",
  avg(dc1Current) as "String 1 Strom",
  avg(dc2Current) as "String 2 Strom"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV ($grouping*60)

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  avg(BatVoltage) as "Bat Spannung",
  avg(if(BatCurrentDir = 0,BatCurrent,0)) as "Bat Strom Laden",
  avg(if(BatCurrentDir = 1,BatCurrent,0)) as "Bat Strom Entnahme"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV ($grouping*60)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  avg(BatPowerEntladen) AS "Entladen",
  avg(BatPowerLaden) AS "Laden",
  avg(BatStateOfCharge) as "Ladestand",
  avg(BatLaden_Frei) AS "Laden frei"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV ($grouping*60)
